name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @bbcworldservice: On Christmas Day 1941, the US entertainer Bing Crosby first performed White Christmas on his radio show. 

It went on to become one of the defining songs of WW2 and became hugely important to a nation trying to heal after the Pearl Harbour attack 

https://t.co/CNRXf9t1l1 https://t.co/BMKPyDvTki
